ClassDesc: Notification style for custom views that are decorated by the system. Instead of providing a notification that is completely custom, a developer can set this style and still obtain system decorations like the notification header with the expand affordance and actions. Use @B_android#app#Notification#Builder#setCustomContentView_E@, @B_android#app#Notification#Builder#setCustomBigContentView_E@ and @B_android#app#Notification#Builder#setCustomHeadsUpContentView_E@ to set the corresponding custom views to display. To use this style with your Notification, feed it to @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#Builder#setStyle_E@ like so: If you are using this style, consider using the corresponding styles like @B_android#support#v7#appcompat#R#style#TextAppearance_AppCompat_Notification_E@ or @B_android#support#v7#appcompat#R#style#TextAppearance_AppCompat_Notification_Title_E@ in your custom views in order to get the correct styling on each platform version.
